name: Resolution_20-441.pdf
text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
D.C. Resolution 20-441, effective April 8, 2014

20 DCSTAT 3366

A RESOLUTION

Proposed
Resolution
20-486

To confirm the appointment of Mr. Jonathan Y. O’Reilly to the Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board Jonathan Y. O’Reilly
Confirmation Resolution of 2014".

Sec. 2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the appointment of:
Mr. Jonathan Y. O’Reilly
10 Q Street, N.E., Apt. B
Washington, D.C. 20002
(Ward 5)
as a community representative member of the Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board,
established by D.C. Official Code § 16-1052, for a 3-year term to end July 20, 2016.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Domestic
Violence
Fatality
Review Board
Jonathan Y.
O’Reilly
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
title: Domestic Violence Fatality Review Board Jonathan Y. O’Reilly Confirmation Resolution of 2014
